languages.text: Увы, краткий курс подготовки, организованный почтенным Абеляром Версерианом для солдат гарнизона, не помог. Нерадивые слуги губернатора Вьятт уступали в качестве повстанцам. Диверсионные налеты терпели крах, и потери росли с каждым днем.

traits.locale_text: Увы, краткий курс подготовки, организованный почтенным Абеляром Версерианом для сил планетарной обороны, не помог. Нерадивые слуги губернатора Вьятт уступали в качестве повстанцам. Диверсионные налеты терпели крах, и потери росли с каждым днем.

languages.text: Alas, the brief training course arranged by the esteemed Abelard Werserian for the garrison made no difference. Governor Vyatt's feckless soldiers were no match for the rebels. The guerrilla attacks were a failure and the losses mounted with every passing day.
languages.original_text: Увы, краткий курс подготовки, организованный почтенным Абеляром Версерианом для солдат гарнизона, не помог. Нерадивые слуги губернатора Вьятт уступали в качестве повстанцам. Диверсионные налеты терпели крах, и потери росли с каждым днем.

traits.locale_text: Alas, the brief training course arranged by the esteemed Abelard Verserian for the planetary defense forces made no difference. Governor Vyatt's feckless soldiers were no match for the rebels. The guerrilla attacks were a failure and the losses mounted with every passing day.

Alas, the brief training course arranged by the esteemed Abelard Verserian for the planetary defense forces made no difference. Governor Vyatt's feckless soldiers were no match for the rebels. The guerrilla attacks were a failure and the losses mounted with every passing day.

Alas, the brief training course arranged by the esteemed Abelard Verserian for the planetary defense forces made no difference. Governor Vyatt's feckless soldiers were no match for the rebels. The guerrilla attacks were a failure and the losses mounted with every passing day.

Alas, the brief training course arranged by the esteemed Abelard Werserian for the garrison made no difference. Governor Vyatt's feckless soldiers were no match for the rebels. The guerrilla attacks were a failure and the losses mounted with every passing day.

Alas, the brief training course arranged by the esteemed Abelard Werserian for the garrison made no difference. Governor Vyatt's feckless soldiers were no match for the rebels. The guerrilla attacks were a failure and the losses mounted with every passing day.

languages.text: むなしくも、尊敬捧げられしアベラード・ウェルザリアンが警備隊にほどこした訓練課程は意味を成さなかった。ビャット総督の無能な兵では反乱軍に歯が立たなかったのだ。ゲリラ攻撃は失敗し、日ごとに損失が増えていった。
languages.original_text: Alas, the brief training course arranged by the esteemed Abelard Werserian for the garrison made no difference. Governor Vyatt's feckless soldiers were no match for the rebels. The guerrilla attacks were a failure and the losses mounted with every passing day.

traits.locale_text: むなしくも、尊敬捧げられしアベラード・ウェルザリアンが警備隊にほどこした訓練課程は意味を成さなかった。ビャット総督の無能な兵では反乱軍に歯が立たなかったのだ。ゲリラ攻撃は失敗し、日ごとに損失が増えていった。

languages.text: 遗憾的是，德高望重的阿贝拉德·韦尔森为驻军安排的简短培训课程毫无效果。维亚特总督软弱无能的士兵根本不是叛军的对手。游击战以失败告终，政府军的损失与日俱增。
languages.original_text: Alas, the brief training course arranged by the esteemed Abelard Werserian for the garrison made no difference. Governor Vyatt's feckless soldiers were no match for the rebels. The guerrilla attacks were a failure and the losses mounted with every passing day.

traits.locale_text: 遗憾的是，德高望重的阿贝拉德·韦尔森为驻军安排的简短培训课程毫无效果。维亚特总督软弱无能的士兵根本不是叛军的对手。游击战以失败告终，政府军的损失与日俱增。

languages.text: Por desgracia, la breve instrucción que el estimado Abelard Werserian había impartido a la guarnición no supuso ninguna diferencia. Los ineptos soldados de la gobernadora Vyatt no eran rival para los rebeldes. Las tácticas de guerrilla fracasaron y las bajas se acumularon día tras día.
languages.original_text: Alas, the brief training course arranged by the esteemed Abelard Werserian for the garrison made no difference. Governor Vyatt's feckless soldiers were no match for the rebels. The guerrilla attacks were a failure and the losses mounted with every passing day.

traits.locale_text: Por desgracia, la breve instrucción que el estimado Abelard Werserian había impartido a la guarnición no supuso ninguna diferencia. Los ineptos soldados de la gobernadora Vyatt no eran rival para los rebeldes. Las tácticas de guerrilla fracasaron y las bajas se acumularon día tras día.

languages.text: Leider machte die von dem geschätzten Abelard Werserian durchgeführte kurze Ausbildung der Garnison keinen Unterschied. Gouverneurin Vyatts inkompetente Soldaten konnten den Rebellen nicht das Wasser reichen. Die Guerillaangriffe waren ein Fehlschlag, und die Verluste wuchsen mit jedem Tag.
languages.original_text: Alas, the brief training course arranged by the esteemed Abelard Werserian for the garrison made no difference. Governor Vyatt's feckless soldiers were no match for the rebels. The guerrilla attacks were a failure and the losses mounted with every passing day.

traits.locale_text: Leider machte die von dem geschätzten Abelard Werserian durchgeführte kurze Ausbildung der Garnison keinen Unterschied. Gouverneurin Vyatts inkompetente Soldaten konnten den Rebellen nicht das Wasser reichen. Die Guerillaangriffe waren ein Fehlschlag, und die Verluste wuchsen mit jedem Tag.

languages.text: Malheureusement, l'entraînement accéléré organisé par l'estimé Abélard Werserian pour la garnison ne fit aucune différence. Les piètres soldats de la gouverneure Vyatt ne firent pas le poids face aux rebelles et leurs attaques de guérilla se soldèrent par un échec cuisant, aux pertes chaque jour un peu plus colossales.
languages.original_text: Alas, the brief training course arranged by the esteemed Abelard Werserian for the garrison made no difference. Governor Vyatt's feckless soldiers were no match for the rebels. The guerrilla attacks were a failure and the losses mounted with every passing day.

traits.locale_text: Malheureusement, l'entraînement accéléré organisé par l'estimé Abélard Werserian pour la garnison ne fit aucune différence. Les piètres soldats de la gouverneure Vyatt ne firent pas le poids face aux rebelles et leurs attaques de guérilla se soldèrent par un échec cuisant, aux pertes chaque jour un peu plus colossales.

languages.text: Ne yazık ki saygıdeğer Abelard Werserian tarafından tertip edilen kısa eğitim programı, Vali Vyatt'ın vasıfsız askerlerinde hiçbir fark yaratmadı. Gerilla saldırıları başarısız oluyor ve kayıplar her geçen gün artıyordu.
languages.original_text: Alas, the brief training course arranged by the esteemed Abelard Werserian for the garrison made no difference. Governor Vyatt's feckless soldiers were no match for the rebels. The guerrilla attacks were a failure and the losses mounted with every passing day.

traits.locale_text: Ne yazık ki saygıdeğer Abelard Werserian tarafından tertip edilen kısa eğitim programı, Vali Vyatt'ın vasıfsız askerlerinde hiçbir fark yaratmadı. Gerilla saldırıları başarısız oluyor ve kayıplar her geçen gün artıyordu.
